msbt.message: Hey! Have you eaten your recommended daily dose of veggies yet, kiddo?
Yes, I have!
Not yet.
What daily dose?

Oh yeah? That's not the answer I was expectin'. Gahaha!See, I'm not a huge fan of veggies myself.I try to eat the amount they say you should, but I always end up with extras on the plate. I'll be stuck eatin' veggies for the rest of my life if I ever wanna catch up

Well, if you're havin' a hard time eatin' the amount they tell you to eat You can always make 'em into a smoothie, like I do! I got this new blender that'll blend anything. Just don't drop your sunglasses into it and then drink the sunglasses smoothie. It doesn't taste as cool as it looks
Aw, c'mon. You don't know that you're supposed to eat a certain amount of veggies every day? It's kind of a lot, but here's a good hackâ€”you can just eat one GIANT veggie, like a pumpkin. Gahaha!
UghI've been feelin' so stiff every mornin' when I get out of bed Reckon I better start exercisin'. Right now, I'm leanin' toward . Is that one that's popular with the kids these days?
Yep, I like to watch it.
Yep, I like to do it.
I watch it and I do it!

No kiddin'? And here I reckoned I might be the only local fanatic.Yep, gimme a bucket of popcorn and and I could watch it all day long. I just gotta be careful when I stand up to cheer. That's how I pulled my hammy once,

Is that a fact? Well, color me surprised, !Maybe you can give me some lessons, eh? Whaddaya say? I've got the heart of an athlete! I've also got the knees of an athletean athlete who retired due to bad knees! Gahaha!

Well, look at you. A regular old go-getter, aren't you?So you're watchin' the tape and you're out practicin' too. That's mighty impressive, kiddo. Shoot, I don't know if there's a world championship for , but I wouldn't bet against you.
Alright, this is kind of a weird question, but whaddaya expect?Imagine there's a fishbowl sittin' in front of you. Nowwhat's inside the fishbowl?
An octopus.
A snake.
A pile of garbage.

OK, so this was one of those personality test things. And I've got your results right here Folks who say "octopus" are always tryin' to act cool and aloof, but really they're softies at heart. Well? Am I right? I'm an octopus fella myself, so I know one when I see one. Gahaha!

OK, so this was one of those personality test things. And I've got your results right here If you pick snake, that means you like cool, quiet places and keepin' to yourself. Am I right? 'Course I am! I like cool, quiet places myself, so I'm like a half-snake at least. Gahaha!

OK, so this was one of those personality test things. And I've got your results right here You picked a pile of garbage. That's interesting. REAL interestingSome people might think you got a real dim view of things, pickin' garbage. But I know better One man's trash is another man's treasure, isn't that right? You're an optimist! I knew it all along. Gahaha!
SayI'm gettin' hungry. What about you? If you could have anything at all, what would you eat right now?
Something light. A little snack.
Something hearty. A three-course meal.
Something sweet. Something sugary.

So you're not really all that hungry. I get it.It's smart to listen to your tummy like that. Wish I could do it more often Yep, sometimes the ol' belly shouts at me to slow down and I just keep right on goin'
Oh yeah? It's that time of day, huh? Need to fuel up for some adventure? Heh. I remember when I was just like you. Good to see you kids still got some of the ol' grit. Gahaha!

Sweet tooth, eh? Well, a few sweets are OK now and again, I suppose The problem with sugar is that it'll give you the ol' jangly legs if you eat too much. AlthoughI once ate a bowl of candy and then set the school record in the triple jump. True story!
Hey, Lemme ask you this one thing.Time. Friendship. Money. You can only pick one.<10_4 /> Which one you got?
Time.
Friendship.
Money.
Yep, time's a big one. You can never get it back, that's for sure.With that in mind, I'll stop yakkin' and let you go about your business. Gahaha!

Heh. Good answer, kiddo. I know time is tempting, and money is REAL tempting, but friends are gold. Shoot, with us bein' on the same brain wavelength like this, I think our friendship is just gettin' started.

Gahaha! Well, points for bein' honest, I guess.Lemme just give you a small nugget of advice. I know money's real, real important, but Time and friendship are the only things you can't buy in this world. So give that some thought. Gahaha!
